content:
I remember most coastlines have sandy beaches,
or rocky reefs,
but ours is a bit strange.

Our world bubble is much better than we imagined,
but I can't shake this feeling that something's not quite right...
Just a hunch.

Mobai called for a residents' meeting,
Maybe there's some new discovery,
Want to come along?

Hmm... I can't wrap my head around this either.
Oh well, let's head back to the Camp first.
Everyone might be waiting for us.

I'm heading to the Camp,
for the Resident council meeting.
Oh right, have you seen Sani?
